attributes.action: Ask the London 2012 Olympic committee to scrap the logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You've probably all seen the logo that the London 2012 committee have proudly released - within hours many amatuers had produced better logos and sent them to the BBC. 

We need a change otherwise we will all have to bear this embarrassing logo for the next 5 years. If you agree, sign now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
